search.query: `admon_index` | stats latest(whenCreated) AS whenCreated, latest(lastLogon) AS lastLogon, latest(pwdLastSet) AS pwdLastSet, latest(userAccountControl) AS userAccountControl, values(admonEventType) AS admonEventType, values(sAMAccountName) AS sAMAccountName by userPrincipalName | lookup userAccountControl.csv userAccountControl output UAC_explanation | eval lastLogonEpoch=strptime(lastLogon,"%I:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y"), pwdLastSetEpoch=strptime(pwdLastSet,"%I:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y"), lastLogon=strftime(strptime(lastLogon,"%I:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y"), "%F %T"), whenCreated=strftime(strptime(whenCreated,"%I:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y"), "%F %T"), pwdLastSet=strftime(strptime(pwdLastSet,"%I:%M.%S %p, %a %m/%d/%Y"), "%F %T"), timeNow=now(), currentYear=strftime(now(), "%Y"), lastLogonDays=round((timeNow-lastLogonEpoch)/86400,1), pwdLastSetDays=round((timeNow-pwdLastSetEpoch)/86400,1), passwordInUseYears=round((timeNow-pwdLastSetEpoch)/31556926,1), passwordInUseYears=if(passwordInUseYears==currentYear,0,passwordInUseYears), machineAccount=if(substr(sAMAccountName,-1)=="$", 1, 0), UAC_explanation=split(UAC_explanation,"|"), domain=upper(replace(userPrincipalName,"(.*@)([^\.]+)(.*)","\2")) | sort 0 - pwdLastSetDays + lastLogonDays | fields machineAccount sAMAccountName domain whenCreated lastLogon lastLogonDays pwdLastSet passwordInUseYears pwdLastSetDays userAccountControl UAC_explanation
| inputlookup userAccountControl.csv | table UAC_explanation | eval UAC_explanation=split(UAC_explanation,"|") | mvexpand UAC_explanation | stats c by UAC_explanation
`admon_index` | stats c by userPrincipalName | eval domain=upper(replace(userPrincipalName,"(.*@)([^\.]+)(.*)","\2")) | stats c by domain | where domain!="OPTIONALPROPERTIES"

table.title: "user" accounts with old passwords (90+ days ) - last 60 days

search.query: $last_logon_filter$ $domain_filter$ $account_name_search$ | where pwdLastSetDays>90 AND machineAccount==0 AND NOT match(admonEventType,".*Deleted.*") AND $uac_filter$ | table sAMAccountName domain whenCreated lastLogon lastLogonDays pwdLastSet passwordInUseYears pwdLastSetDays userAccountControl UAC_explanation

table.title: "machine" accounts with old passwords (30+ days) - last 60 days

search.query: $last_logon_filter$ $domain_filter$ $account_name_search$ | where pwdLastSetDays>30 AND machineAccount==1 AND $uac_filter$ | table sAMAccountName domain whenCreated lastLogon lastLogonDays pwdLastSet passwordInUseYears pwdLastSetDays userAccountControl UAC_explanation
`admon_index` sAMAccountName={GROUP} | stats latest(member) AS member | eval members=split(member, "|") | fields members | mvexpand members

table.title: Operating Systems in use - last 30 days

search.query: `admon_index` objectClass=*computer* | fillnull value="N/A" operatingSystemServicePack | stats latest(operatingSystem) AS operatingSystem, latest(operatingSystemServicePack) AS operatingSystemServicePack, max(_time) AS _time by dNSHostName | stats latest(_time) AS lastReportTime, values(dNSHostName) AS Hostnames, count by operatingSystem operatingSystemServicePack | eval lastReportTime=strftime(lastReportTime, "%F %T"), Hostnames=if(count>20, "**To many Hostnames to display**", Hostnames)
